Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 62nd overall pick, by Ashburn in 1976...
Injured on 4/14/1976 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 5/13/1978 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...

Released by Ashburn on 4/7/1988...

Injured on 5/15/1991 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
